General.Name: Raydium Semi-Conductor
General.Description: Raydium Semiconductor Corporation provides integrated circuit (IC) solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers driver IC, power IC, touch control IC, and power management and timing controller IC solutions for artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, smart TVs, professional gaming, computer information, automotive, and industrial control products, as well as mobile and wearable devices. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No 23. Li-Hsin Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 300
